meanings.definition: A place where prescription medications are dispensed.
meanings.sent1: I went to the pharmacies to pick up my medicine.
meanings.sent2: There are many pharmacies in our town.
meanings.sent3: The pharmacies were so busy that the pharmacist had to run around like a chicken with its head cut off.
meanings.sent4: The pharmacies stood like beacons of health in the bustling city.
meanings.sent5: The pharmacies hummed with the sound of healing.

meanings.definition: The practice of preparing and dispensing drugs.
meanings.sent1: Pharmacies require careful attention to detail when preparing medications.
meanings.sent2: Learning about pharmacies involves understanding different types of drugs.
meanings.sent3: The pharmacies turned drug preparation into a delicate dance of precision.
meanings.sent4: In the world of pharmacies, each drug is a key to unlocking health.
meanings.sent5: The art of pharmacies lies in the science of drug dispensing.

meanings.sent1: My dream is to work in pharmacies and help people with their medications.
meanings.sent2: Pharmacies require pharmacists to have extensive knowledge of medications.
meanings.sent3: The pharmacies welcomed a new pharmacist with open arms.
meanings.sent4: In the realm of pharmacies, the pharmacist is a guardian of health.
meanings.sent5: The heart of pharmacies beats with the dedication of pharmacists.
